      public void discoverServers​(Cons<Host> cons, java.lang.Runnable done)
      Starts discovering servers on a different thread. Callback is run on the main Arc thread.

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.Object object, Net.SendMode mode)

    • sendExcept

      public void sendExcept​(NetConnection except, java.lang.Object object, Net.SendMode mode)
      Send an object to everyone EXCEPT a certain client. Server-side only.

    • pingHost

      public void pingHost​(java.lang.String address, int port, Cons<Host> valid, Cons<java.lang.Exception> failed)
      Pings a host in an new thread. If an error occured, failed() should be called with the exception.

    • active

      public boolean active()
      Whether the net is active, e.g. whether this is a multiplayer game.
